channel.title: activerecord on Seven steps
channel.description: Recent content in activerecord on Seven steps

item.title: Ruby on Rails + Sybase
item.description: Caveat: This adapter may only work with the enterprise edition of Sybase (i.e. Sybase ASE) not with SQLAnywhere (Sybase ASA) =gem install activerecord-sybase-adapter -s http://gems.rubyonrails.org = 1 2 3 4 5 6 ActiveRecord::Base.establish_connection( :adapter => "sybase", :database => "test", :host => "www.yourdbserver.com", :username => "kevin", :password => "test") Play!
